Military Provocation by S. Korean Army 
    Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean army brought two armored cars into a spot near Military Demarcation Line marker No. 0108 in the western sector of the front between 16:50 and 17:00 on November 6, according to a military source.
 This grave provocation committed when multi-faceted dialogues were in progress between the north and the south of Korea vividly shows how frantically the south Korean military is working to drive the north-south relations to tension and confrontation, following the U.S. imperialists' hostile policy toward the DPRK.
